summary: Frontend testing completed for Epilepsy Approach page with updated Seizure Algorithm. All 5 features verified working: 1) Login flow with test@test.com/12341234 - PASS, 2) Navigation to Children > Approaches > Epilepsy tab - PASS, 3) Seizure Algorithm section renders correctly with blue flowchart boxes - PASS, 4) Box 1 and Box 2 yellow panels visible on the right side - PASS, 5) Flowchart shows Abnormal movement -> is it a seizure -> Yes/No branches - PASS

tests: Login page loads correctly
Email/password fields accept input
Login with test@test.com / 12341234 succeeds
Redirects to landing page after login
Medical disclaimer modal appears and can be dismissed
Landing page shows NICU and Children options
Children dashboard loads with all menu items
Approaches section accessible via /children/approaches
Select Approach dropdown works correctly
Epilepsy - Including Status (SMC) option selectable via data-testid='tab-epilepsy'
SEIZURES ALGORITHM title displays
Found 41 blue flowchart boxes (bg-blue-600)
Blue boxes have white text for contrast
Flowchart structure renders correctly with branches
Connecting lines visible between boxes
Found 2 yellow reference panels (bg-yellow-100)
Box 1 labeled 'Box 1. Criteria of common seizures'
Box 1 contains: 1- Rhythmic movement, 2- No clear observable preceding symptoms, 3- Rules of generalized/focal seizures
Box 2 labeled 'Box 2.'
Box 2 contains: A: airways already protected, B: oxygen Facemask, C: blood collection
Abnormal movement (rounded blue START box) found
'is it a seizure? refer to box 1' box found
No branch leads to 'check seizure mimickers in table 2'
Yes branch leads to 'stabilize the patient (ABC): refer to box 2'
'call for help' box found after stabilization
'still seizing > 5 min' box found
Yes/No branches continue from 'still seizing' decision point
DEFINITION OF SEIZURES (blue section) renders
DEFINITION OF EPILEPSY (purple section) renders
STATUS EPILEPTICUS ALGORITHM section visible below main flowchart

critical_code_review_comments: Seizure Algorithm correctly implements the flowchart structure with blue boxes and yellow side panels
Box 1 and Box 2 positioned correctly on the right side with proper content
Flowchart branches (Yes/No) clearly labeled and connected
data-testid attributes present for reliable UI testing (approach-selector, tab-epilepsy)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Test path: Login > Accept disclaimer > Home > Children > Approaches > Select 'Epilepsy - Including Status (SMC)' from dropdown. The Seizure Algorithm renders with: 1) Abnormal movement (rounded blue start box), 2) is it a seizure decision box, 3) No/Yes branches, 4) Box 1 and Box 2 yellow panels on right side. The page also includes STATUS EPILEPTICUS ALGORITHM, FREQUENT SEIZURES ALGORITHM, and several tables (Types of Seizures, Seizure Mimickers, Secondary Causes, Anti-Seizure Medications).
